example.eg: They set the new store up on Maple Street.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 建立, 创立, 设立

example.eg: I bought my son a swing set and had to set it up in the yard yesterday.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拼装, 装配, 组装

example.eg: He's really paranoid and always thinks people are trying to set him up.
Helen set up the chairs in a semi-circle.
Can we set up a meeting for 8 November?
George and Lisa met when mutual friends set them up.
example.egtrans: 乔治和丽萨的见面是两人的共同好友安排的。

dsense.name: set [sb] up with [sb], set up [sb] with [sb]

example.eg: Ed's sister tried to set him up with one of her friends, but they didn't hit it off.
example.egtrans: 艾德的姐妹尝试为他与自己的一位朋友说媒，但是他们之间合不来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...介绍给, 给...和...说媒, 给...和...牵红线

example.eg: That generous woman set us all up with drinks last night.
The Tech Support engineer set up my new computer.
You've got a great setup here for working from home.
example.egtrans: 你家中办公室的布置非常好。

example.eg: We left our setup on stage for tomorrow night's concert.
example.egtrans: 我们把设备留在了舞台上，方便明天晚上开音乐会。

example.eg: They invited you there as a set-up to rob your house.
example.egtrans: 他们把你邀请到那里，是要设下陷阱，抢劫你的住处。

example.eg: Double-click on the icon to start the setup.
I'm going to paint a simple still life set-up with a vase of flowers and a table cloth.
example.egtrans: 我要画一幅简单的静物摆放画——一个插满花的花瓶和一块桌布。

example.eg: Linda's set up shop doing sewing repairs and dressmaking.
